euInitiatives: The ICA has signed in March 2016, a Framework Partnership Agreement with European Commission for a global development program to benefit and advance the cooperative sector worldwide. ICA-AP is one of the project implementation partners covering roughly 30 countries in the AP region. EU New Consensus on Development and Country Roadmaps on CSO engagement are important guiding instruments.
